Sentencas: Ceria-samaria (CeO2-Sm2O3) is one of the most interesting of fluorite oxides since its oxide ionic conductivity is higher than that of yttria-stabilized zirconia and other CeO2-based oxides.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system

Sentencas: In this study, the effective index is proposed to maximize the oxide ionic conductivity in CeO2-Sm2O3 based oxides.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system

Sentencas: Considering the crystallographic character of fluorite structure in CeO2-Sm2O3 system, the oxygen vacancy level was combined with the ionic radius mismatch between host and dopant rations as criteria for fast ionic conduction.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system

Sentencas: SmxCe1-xO2-delta (0.2 < x < 0.3), (Sm0.5C0.5)(x)Ce1-xO2-delta (1.175 < x < 0.3), and (Sm0.936Cs0.06Li0.004)(x)Ce1-xO2-delta (0.2 < x < 0.275) were prepared and characterized as examples with low, intermediate, and high index, respectively.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system

Sentencas: The oxide ionic conductivity increased with an increase of the effective index, confirming the validity of the index.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system

Sentencas: Furthermore, the electrochemical properties of Sm0.25Ce0.75O1.88, (Sm0.5Ca0.5)(0.225)Ce0.775O1.84, and (Sm0.936Cs0.06Li0.004)(0.25)Ce0.75O1.86 were investigated in the temperature range from 700 to 1000 degrees C as representative examples.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system

Sentencas: The oxide ionic conductivity in reducing atmosphere improved with increasing index.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system

Sentencas: It was found that (Sm0.936Cs0.06Li0.004)(0.25)Ce0.75O1.86 With the highest index value in the CeO2-Sm2O3 system, exhibited high oxide ionic conductivity and good performance in planar solid-oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Application of a crystallographic index for improvement of the electrolytic properties of the CeO2-Sm2O3 system
